articles.title: Covid-19 News: Live Updates - The New York Times
articles.description: Many experts say the official total is probably an undercount. Had it not been for the removal of hundreds of deaths from tallies in California, the country would have surpassed the mark already.
articles.content:

articles.title: Cases of a dangerous Covid-19 variant are 'rapidly increasing' in US, expert says - CNN
articles.description: As US states lift more coronavirus restrictions, experts are worried people who aren't fully vaccinated could contribute to further spread of the virus.
